Paccayacatukka
Nahetu-naārammaṇa
48.
78Nahetuṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (1)
49.
79Hetuṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
80Nahetuṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
81Hetuṃ abyākatañca nahetuṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu abyākato dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (1)
